name: Ultra Tech Journey
description:
This UNIQ marks your participation in the first episode of the Ultra Tech Journey masterclass series, where you learned to create your first Uniq Factory and took your first steps into Web3 on Ultra.
You explored how to deploy your own UNIQ collection, understood the structure of UNIQs, and contributed to the growing creative economy on Ultra.io.
More than just a badge of attendance, this UNIQ is proof of your curiosity, initiative, and willingness to grow as a builder on the Ultra network.

Holder Benefits:
- Reimbursement of creation fees for 1 UNIQ collection
- Beta access to upcoming Ultra Times dApps
Cherish this UNIQ as a token of your journey â€“ and a key to future Ultra experiences.
author: AllegorickBlock
